lenders.occupational_info: I determine the environmental effects of large projects, such as gas well fields, electric transmission lines, roads, and pipelines. I then work with the companies to reduce those impacts as much as possible. Margie is retired from helping victims of domestic violence.

lenders.name: Nora

lenders.occupational_info: I craft eco-friendly jewelry using recycled fine and sterling silver and fair trade/ethically sourced gemstones and other materials.

lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to live in a country where access to capital can make business dreams come true.  The least I can do is try and provide the same to other countries.

lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.occupation: Consultant who works to reduce pesticide use
lenders.loan_because: I've always been interested in micro-lending and thought it was a great idea, but not until I found Kiva did I know how to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a very tiny consulting business where I work with organizations and government agencies to help them reduce their use of pesticide and implement "integrated pest management" (IPM) in urban areas. IPM uses many different methods to combat pests such as sanitation, pest proofing, and trapping. Pesticides are one tool of many and are used as a last resort.

lenders.occupational_info: I learn for a living.

lenders.name: Erika

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to see if this brilliant idea works and want to support it. I am doing fine, my family is well and I have the funds to invest some money.

lenders.name: Sacramento RPCVs

lenders.name: Lynn

To leave the world a better place with my having been in it! I also donate because faith without works is not really faith at all.
lenders.occupational_info: I help prepare patients who are going to receive cardiac catheterization procedures in the hospital and I instruct them in ways to improve their heart health.

lenders.name: Hadley
lenders.loan_because: It's my belief that if we each did what we were able to do to help others - not above and beyond, simply what we are able to do - we could change the world.

lenders.name: ROBIN

lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to those that are in need. It might be to read to someone that is blind, to hold a hand of someone that is hurting, or to just listen. I work as a cashier for my job and love seeing the same people shopping each week. We have become friends.

lenders.loan_because: we care

lenders.name: Mount Madonna School
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can help people who cannot borrow money from a regular bank. We get help from Kiva in learning about risk and due diligence and how to use modern technology to help others in need across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Part of our curriculum is to produce a DVD and sell it to raise money for a social service project. Kiva provides a perfect win-win opportunity because we help those in need and the money comes back to our school. Next year we will repeat the process again.

lenders.loan_because: I want every person in all countries to have the same opportunities that I have had.

lenders.loan_because: I know who I am.

lenders.name: Donna

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
